channel.title: Mac Cast
channel.description: A podcast about randomness and tutorials on how to use the Macintosh.
channel.itunes:author: RealRandomRadio
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast about randomness and tutorials on how to use the Macintosh.

item.title: Mac Cast for March 19, 2012
item.description: In this very short episode of Mac Cast, we demonstrate one thing and one thing only. Anthony gives us a demonstration of Garage Band, a program for the Mac that will do a lot with sound! Listen as he gives us an overview of one of its more entertaining features, a variety of effects that can be applied to sound. Quite entertaining for a short episode.
item.author: Real Random Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: Mac Cast for March 19, 2012
item.itunes:author: Real Random Radio

item.title: Mac Cast for March 5, 2012
item.description: In this episode, Anthony gives us an update of the RealRandomRadio website and mentions a switch over from our current web host onto a linode that he had purchased. This, however, is not necessarily true. The only thing that we really did was purchase a domain that we could use to easily connect to some of the servers that we have set up. Also, yours truly, makes an appearance on the show and talks about some of the other features of the site so far. We demonstrate some of the edited episodes of the Mac Cast Podcast, and talk about other things that relate to the Macintosh.
item.author: Real Random Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: Mac Cast for March 5, 2012

item.title: Mac Cast for February 6, 2012
item.description: In this podcast, our Mac Cast crew goofs off and they tend to steer away from the topic of which they were going to cover. Check them out as they entertain you with a variety of randomness, and possibly interesting information regarding software for Macintosh. They give you a couple of Mac tips, and the crew tries to find a combination of variety of intros so that they can use them for openings. Expect humor and more from this episode.
item.author: Real Random Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: Mac Cast for February 6, 2012

item.title: Mac Cast for January 30, 2012
item.description: In this podcast, there is a lot of side conversation, along with technical problems and adjustments. These guys are beginners, so you might want to give them a break. There is also some discussion over the various types of IPhones and their capabilities. Anthony also gives us an update on the site, and gives us a short demonstration on how it functions. That was a while back, which means that the site could have changed since then. I also give a brief introduction of the Mac Cast episode in which I tell you of ways that you can contact me. This and more to come for this episode! Enjoy this entertaining podcast, with some sense of humor.
item.author: Real Random Radio

item.title: Mac Cast for January 23, 2012
item.description: In this older episode, we have some members of the Mac Cast crew that talk about a variety of randomness, as well as useful information regarding the Macintosh. We have two short demonstrations, and we hope that they serve useful.
item.author: Real Random Radio
